1019870.name: NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Taishi with Power Up Kit Demo
1019870.description:
Please use this software to check, how smoothly "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Taishi with Power Up Kit" (for Windows®) will operate on your PC.

Before using
-This software only works on Windows® 7/8.1/10(64bit) Japanese Version. It does not support other language versions, and OS.
-This software does not necessarily assure that "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Taishi with Power Up Kit" (for Windows®) will operate.
-This software may not work correctly, by combinations of PC environments and resident programs.
-This "Demo" is not a trial version. Many of the functions are restricted.

How to use the Demo
1. Click the title screen to start the Demo.
2. Select the "Options" inside the "Function" on the bottom right corner, you will be able to change settings such as the "Screen Size" and "CG Quality."
3. By the progress button near the bottom right corner, you can change the Demo's speed.
4. To end the Demo, click the x button on the top right corner, or select "Exit" inside the "Function" at the bottom right corner.

Please check if there are any display or operating problems while the Demo plays, on your PC.

*If you have any resident programs working, the Demo may slow down.
*If the operation runs slow, it may improve by changing the "CG Quality" to "Low" in the "Options."
*The operations may improve, by updating the DirectX or graphic card's drivers to the latest version.
1019870.supported_languages:
繁体中文, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
